name: Shanthi Knitss
overview:
Shanthi Knitss came into inception as a partnership firm in the famous city of Tiruppur, which falls in southern India in the state of Tamil Nadu. Since, our inception in the year 2003, we are into manufacturing, supplying and exporting of Kids Wear, Men’s T-Shirts, Men’s Winter Wear, Ladies Wear and many more.

Valued Customers: Manufacturing of exclusive range has allowed us to gain a prominent foothold in the market. Our quality of products has earned us customers not only from India, but we have been successful to cater to a huge number of clients around the Globe as well. Apart from quality we also offer our customer to choose from wide range and other services which make them happy.

Our Quality: We primarily focus on maintain prescribed quality standards in our product range, hence leave no stone unturned in achieving the same. Comprehensive quality control policies are formulated by us, in order to achieve our target.

Client Satisfaction: We have gained complete satisfaction of our customers by offering them exact solutions to their requirements. Committed to providing industry renowned customer, we are chosen for our efficiency in building long term relations with our clients. Besides, coordination with our clients at every step enables us to address their demands and needs in a most satisfactory manner.

Why Us?: It gives a great feeling to be known in the market as a prominent leader in manufacturing supplying and exporting of clothing items which are widely welcomed by customers purely on the basis of merit.
